CustomField.formula: IF((Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c = 'Reseller'||Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c ='Standard'||Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c ='AC Trial') && (Term_Length__c =1 || ISBLANK( Term_Length__c )||Term_Length__c=0) , (0.09* Software_Amount__c )+(0.03* Consulting_Amount__c ), IF((Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c = 'Reseller'||Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c ='Standard'||Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c ='AC Trial') && (Term_Length__c =2), (0.108* Software_Amount__c )+(0.03* Consulting_Amount__c ), IF((Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c = 'Reseller'||Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c ='Standard'||Opportunity.Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c ='AC Trial') && (Term_Length__c =3),(0.135* Software_Amount__c )+(0.03* Consulting_Amount__c ) , 0.00) ) )
CustomField.label: Commissions Amount
